oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sevier. John Sevier home.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nancy Rosette (Etta) Myers Slatery (1888-1965).
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: View of John Sevier’s Plantation Home, Pickens Gap Pike near junction of Neubert Springs Pike, Knox County, TN. Also known as Marble Springs. Taken by Nancy Rosette (Etta) Myers Slatery (1888-1965).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Historic buildings; Historic sites; Houses; Views;
